word_mean: ［拉］养育院，救济所：避难或庇护所，过去为支持和照顾无助者和残废者的慈善机构。例如收养智力缺陷者、情绪紊乱者或盲人的机构

sentence.Network_en: Fewer than 7% of asylum seekers are accepted as political refugees.
sentence.Network_cn: 寻求避难者中有不到7%的人被视作政治难民。

sentence.Network_en: He applied for asylum in 1987 after fleeing the police back home.
sentence.Network_cn: 1987年他在本国逃脱警察追捕后，就申请了政治庇护。

sentence.Network_en: France had agreed to his request for political asylum.
sentence.Network_cn: 法国已经同意了他寻求政治庇护的请求。

list.abs: 外交庇护-外交庇护(diplomatic asylum)是指一国使馆或领馆利用其馆舍,对因违反驻在国法律并将受到驻在国拘捕而申请避难的人(主要是政治犯)给予庇护。-waijiaobihu
签证 - Leia的日志 - 网易博客 ... orphan n. 孤儿 orphan asylum 孤儿院 parole n. 假释,有条件的释放.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(104) ... politic 精明的 political asylum 政治庇护 political science 政治学.
对寻求庇护者（Asylum Seekers）有特殊规定， Scottish Refugee Council （苏格兰难民议会）能提供建议、信息与帮助。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English  (in the sense 'place of refuge', especially for criminals): via Latin from Greek asulon 'refuge', from asulos 'inviolable', from a- 'without' + sulon 'right of seizure'. Current senses date from the 18th cent

encyclopedia.content: 来自芝加哥的重金属摇滚乐队Disturbed,在2010年8月31日，向全球发售第5张专辑“Asylum”。连续3次占据全美Billborad排行榜首。此次专辑可以看出Disturbed保持对重金属音乐的新颖性和先进性，且试探自己的极限的精神。 此次专辑里的歌曲远比上一次专辑“Indestructible”要好的多。此次专辑的最大特点是倾向与攻击性的吉他独奏增长和强节奏性的演奏风格。 在此次专辑中，最有印象的歌曲是“The infection”，此曲是写着对糟糕的人

entry.def: If a government gives a person from another country asylum, they allow them to stay, usually because they are unable to return home safely for political reasons.

example.ex: He applied for asylum in 1987 after fleeing the police back home.
example.tran: 1987年他在本国逃脱警察追捕后，就申请了政治庇护。

entry.def: An asylum is a psychiatric hospital.

means.word_mean: 1. a shelter from danger or hardship
2. a hospital for mentally incompetent or unbalanced person

auth_sentence.content: Several thousand refugees given asylum after Chinese annex Tibet.
auth_sentence.res_content: Several thousand refugees given asylum after Chinese annex Tibet.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Several thousand refugees given asylum after Chinese annex Tibet.

auth_sentence.content: Three years later, he was granted political asylum.
auth_sentence.res_content: Three years later, he was granted political asylum.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Three years later, he was granted political asylum.

auth_sentence.content: Last month the Ecuadorean Government granted him political asylum.
auth_sentence.res_content: Last month the Ecuadorean Government granted him political asylum.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Last month the Ecuadorean Government granted him political asylum.

sentences.en: Having sought asylum in the West for many years, they were eventually granted it.
sentences.cn: 他们获得了在西方以寻求多年的避难权。

jushi.english: Asylums are now called mental hospitals.
jushi.chinese: 疯人院现在叫精神病医院。

jushi.english: He sought asylum in the church.
The government gave asylum to some extremists from across the border.
jushi.chinese: 政府给予那些越过国境来的极端主义者以政治庇护。
